content:
衛生福利部民國107年7月20日 衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等
of the National Health Service Act, implemented in 1948, and good personal relations : with bacteriologists throughout the country. For these reasons it has been possible . to centralize all information on the salmonella problem at the Central public Health Laboratory.
a
The function of the National Simonella mentre is to collect information on the distribution of salmonella serotypes within the country, to have a Knowledge of the distribution of types in the world, to disseminate information on technical methods, to teach others the mehods of salmonella identification, to investigate A the antigenic structure and biochemical reactions etc. of all new types and to prepare and supply diagnostic material to other laboratories.
In the United Kingdom the last-named of these functions ( the preparation and supply of diagnostic material to other laboratories) is carried out mainly by the Standards Laboratory for Serological Reagents in respect of sera, and by the National Collection of Type Cultures in re pset of bacterial cultures. The National Simonella Contre may therefore be regarded as consisting of three component units, e the Salmonella Reference Laboratory, the Standards Laboratory for Serological Rengents, and the National Collection of Type Cultures, all located at the Central public Health Laboratory, Colindale, London.
In addition to the Salmonella Reference Laboratory at Colindale there is a reference laboratory in Glasgow, Scotland, and a poultry reference laboratory at the Veterinary Research Station, Weybridge. The three laboratories work in close collaboration, any new, unusual or difficult strains being sent to Colindale, The annual return from the three laboratorles are exchanged.
The Salmonella Reference laboratory receives any culture which it is cons dered could be a salmonella, salmonella cultures requiring identification, and salmonella cultures which may be giving equivocal results. 2
The strainscare sent in by all types of laboratories, and so cover a wide field. The usual laboratories are :
diagnostic hospital laboratorios public health laboratories private Laboratories veterinary laboratorios food investigation laboratories.
29th Academia Histonet
- 17 -
62 :selected: :selected:
